documents.document: @jk_rowling you have no idea how much I love you right now!! 😂😂
@C2Cfestival any news on @HunterHayes Meet and Greets in Glasgow? Got them for his past two UK tours, dying to meet him again #countrymusic
the @David_Tennant to @mattsmith_dw regeneration is still one of my favourite things ever!
@semadivad you're not old unless you spend 4 hours walking around the place and coming out with nothing. You're still young :P
@Unfortunate the only thing unfortunate about the series is that we have to wait til next year for #TheAustereAcademy. That was my favourite
@badgalbrie watch the whole season ;)
@Unfortunate Just finished binge watching the entire season! Fantastic job :D When is series 2 coming out then? ;)
@ActuallyNPH absolutely owned Count Olaf and was a hilarious Stefano. Fantastic actor ☺#aseriesofunfortunateevents
@BradChaseXXX oh my god THANK YOU!!!
@meganereilly_95 @Jenn__Rodgers you have no idea how much I wish there was a @MileyCyrus concert 😭😭
@Jenn__Rodgers pfft, I'm not that far ;)
@JamesBourne will Falling For You make it into the set for the #nightdriver tour?
@scottborchetta so the @taylorswift13 show at @circuitamericas was recorded. Any plans on it being released to relive the magical night?
@Amy__Macdonald if that's the case, we need to make this number 1! :D
@Amy__Macdonald 'Dream On' is the perfect addition to my gym treadmill playlist ☺can't wait for my deluxe box set on Feb 17th!!
@BenPhillipsUK hope everything's okay :O
@multayply she'll have them for every tour. Probably has a Red Tour DVD as well...
@tophergen are you alright? :O
@PhilipsCare_UK thank you, I'll try that out :)
@kickstarter could someone explain to me why my successfully funded campaign has only paid out 83% of the money? What happened to 8-10%
@PhilipsCare_UK Happy New Year! Thank you for the link, one disc I tried was new but worked in another player, the others have worked before
@IKEAUK it was 302.691.48 at the Edinburgh store. Sold out everywhere. It's the end of the line but wondered if anything similar was coming.
@Philips how do i request a Firmware Update Disc for my BDP3100/05 Blu-Ray Player? Had a few new discs that just wont play.
@IKEAUK any products similar to Oppland Chest of 3 Drawers 1 Door coming into stock anytime soon? I love it but out of stock everywhere :(
@PatriciaHeaton go with "swag-tastic" and "bae-licious" if you want to find one to wind the kids up even more :)
@The_Wldlfe keep it up guys :D love from the UK
@virginmedia I'm not bothered about credit, I want internet! Hope my virgin phone isn't going to be charged for the overuse of mobile data..
@virginmedia got told you're not going to fix the broadband until January 5th?!? What kind of service is that? Outraged is an understatement
@virginmedia thank you very much ☺
@ITV amazing to see all the Fantastic Beasts and Harry Potter loving on your channel! Thank you 😍😊⚡️🌌
@virginmedia ...and not just an automated message? Thank you (2/2)
@virginmedia according to that, my broadband service is fine and there are no problems. Can I get a phone number to speak to a person (1/2)
@virginmedia my home wifi has been out for 4 days, getting told by an automated message there's "a problem in my area and it's being sorted"
@BigMachine that last tweet was meant to say physical @taylorswift13 single ^^
@BigMachine will the physical @taylorswift13 be included with the Fearless box set for sale tomorrow? Would still l… https://t.co/kmuqidva4R
I just entered to win great prizes in the #12DaysofBMLG Giveaways sweeps from @BigMachine https://t.co/yVsw47BtSF
@Jenn__Rodgers add it to the pile of bottles that everyone else will be buying you because no-one knows what to get you haha!
@jk_rowling please make this a link between the two series somewhere down the line in the @FantasticBeasts franchis… https://t.co/ur8IHc46hg
@TheSSEHydro what happened to the 10:30 curfew? Now we're stuck in Glasgow overnight with nowhere to stay!
@PostOffice I'm waiting in a huge queue to post a parcel. Woman comes to lottery counter and counter staff serve them first. Why prioritise?
I just took part in Advent Calendar lottery! Answer questions to win exclusive @C2Cfestival prizes #c2cxmas https://t.co/1byl9tLx4j
@tophergen stupid question but.. everything okay? x
@Ruby_Hutchison I really want to know what this is now :'(
@Ruby_Hutchison tbf I never check twitter... I'd never know 😂😂
@thetrainline No problem, thank you for explaining :)
@thetrainline why do prices go up and down so much? Went to book tickets that are £50 each way more expensive than they were last night! :(
@lkowalskimusic once a Facebook event is made I'll get adding everyone 😍Thanks for doing another fab night! Long live 🎤
@Jenn__Rodgers you're right im not. im hilarious :*
@Amy__Macdonald will you ever do meet and greet tickets for any of your shows? Been waiting since 2007 :'(
@Jenn__Rodgers it usually comes after every Sunday 😏😂
@SpotifyCares running it on PC, even in the Local Files playlist it keeps telling me it can't be played and I have to import it
Kickstarter campaign for my documentary film! Have a little read :D https://t.co/vYtNvs73yY
@on_lothianbuses will the new N106 bus serve the Jewel like 104 and 107, or Milton road like the 113? 😊
Got my #Glasgow @C2Cfestival Friday ticket! Can't wait to see @HunterHayes for the 4th time; @dariusrucker and @reba for the 1st! #country
@travisatreo I was hoping to use your cover of "Youth" by Troye Sivan in a student documentary. Would you be happy for me to do this? :)

@ScotRail any planned disruptions between Edinburgh and Dundee on Monday, November 7th? 10am train up to Dundee and 21:19 train return. :)
@C2Cfestival when will we find out who is playing which of the 3 cities on which of the 3 days? #C2C2017
@C2CGlasgow will there be any meet and greet's, paid or unpaid? Have withdrawal symptoms from @HunterHayes after the 2 UK tours last year ^^
@F1 any plans to release the full @taylorswift13 concert from Saturday night?
@bo_ewing you were so close to me the whole night!
@BigMachine @taylorswift13 Picture To Burn got me through a lot of hard times in high school and is a family favourite! Liam; Edinburgh, UK
@jk_rowling would you be willing to talk to us in our @EdinburghNapier student doc about positive impacts pop culture have on mental health?
@troyesivan when will you be coming back to the UK? Hoping to see you this Sunday in Austin the night after @taylorswift13 :D
@on_lothianbuses 104 was empty upstairs, 107 had 4 or 5 people on board
@on_lothianbuses so the 104 and 107 have both passed parrotshot without stopping, going to be late for uni now
@taylorswift13 please play this anthem at @circuitamericas in 21 days time! <3 13 days until we fly from Scotland https://t.co/X5QuaC8Oa5
@jk_rowling ...is one of many pop cultures to have a positive impact on mental health. Would you be willing to talk with us/give permission?
@jk_rowling For my 4th year TV Final Project (@EdinburghNapier ) I was hoping to do a short doc. on how the Harry Potter world... (1/2)
@nenaofficial @YouTube so when will we get 99 Luftballons across The UK? :D
30 days to go until I see taylorswift perform at circuitoftheamericas for the F1 Grand Prix!… https://t.co/9nxSVivack
@Amy__Macdonald Would you be up for making a short cameo and the end of a music video, to be filmed in Glasgow end of November? :)
@eventim_uk Followed back
@eventim_uk I havent received confirmation email and nothing in my Order History, but payment for Olly Murs went through? Heelp :'(
@on_lothianbuses can I use my Ridacard on EastCoast services 107 and 124 or are they not operated by yourselves? Thank you :)
@axs @GreenDay I saw the T&Cs for names printed on tickets to deter scalpers! This gives me so much hope to actually getting tickets now! :D
@Busted is #Album3 meant to be listed on Amazon already? November 11th?
@hmvEdinburgh any word on where the store will be relocating to? Or is "relocation" just a front for closing? :/
@LillySwifty who? :O
Heading off to a "Ten Years of taylorswift " tribute show in #Glasgow tonight! Two months today,… https://t.co/msqt7xYrxD
@ScotRail are there additional services/carriages in place between Edinburgh and Glasgow during the festival?
Mean (Taylor Swift Cover) - Liam T. Clayton LIVE from Whistlebinkies: https://t.co/ouQMEQHUJY via @YouTube
@bo_ewing full song, you have to give us the full song! :O <3
@Sandi_Thom any news on the album 6 release date? I need some "Carry You Over The Finish Line" in my life :D #FavouriteLiveSong
@BenPhillipsUK are you guys going to be at the Cinema Experiences? Considering booking Edinburgh, if you are I'm definitely doing it! :D
@Virgin_TrainsEC the 10:30 Edinburgh to London Kings X is the worst service I've ever been on. Diversions, 2+ hour delay and now now driver!
@prestigeflowers disgusted that my order never arrived today! Ordered on Monday. I'll sort something else out, cancel and refund please.
All of you, seriously?!? #YouTube #promotions https://t.co/D2l4r89c9A
@deanlemon @ROOM94 im in London the weekend before :'(
One of these days, it'd be nice to get a comment on my Youtube that isn't "nice vid, you should check mine out too" - like, stop spamming!!!

@BBCOne can someone tell that woman in the Manchester room who's annoyed at #indyref2 that we stayed because a No vote would secure us in EU
@NicolaSturgeon and yet we are still getting dragged out the EU. Please call for #indyref2
There are some aboslute crackers on this album! I can't wait to see @Sandi_Thom tonight in Dundee :) ♫ https://t.co/PGVTar6HjG
@BJAofficial will #AmericanIdiotMusical be made into a movie like Rock of Ages? Saw some UK shows a few weeks ago and they were brilliant!
2 days until I see @Sandi_Thom for the SIXTH time! :O
@cdbaby .. I want to. I've just spent close to £300 ($500) on CD pressings that now no longer match their digital counterparts!
@cdbaby I just had to resubmit my album because apparently I can't call it an EP with 7 tracks. I should be able to call my art what.. (1/2)
@OwenJones84 the fact the other two wouldn't let you get your point across really pissed me off. Everything you managed to say was right!
